dt-example.title: Data source change event
dt-example.info: This example demonstrates the use of the `-event rowgroup-datasrc` event which is triggered whenever the grouping data source is changed (through the `-api rowGroup().dataSrc()` method). Three links are provided which will change the grouping data source, and the `-event rowgroup-datasrc` event is then used to change the table's fixed ordering (`-api order.fixed()`) to reflect that change.
